summary: Diff adds a multi-section single-page portfolio (Hero, Journey timeline w/ scroll reveal + progress indicator, Work tabbed categories, Services cards w/ CTA, Contact form w/ validation + placeholders) and a warm/copper theme with reduced-motion handling. However, the requested generated icon assets are not evidenced as present/used, and several extra/auth-related infrastructure pieces were added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static generated image assets (hero background + category/service icons) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly; use hero image prominently and use generated icons consistently for categories/services.
missing_requirements.reason: The hero and timeline accent images are referenced, but the diff does not show the required generated icon sets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor does it show those generated icons being used for Work category visuals or Service cards. Work and Services currently use lucide-react icons, not the specified generated icon PNG sets. Also, the diff summary omits some added files, so asset presence cannot be verified from the provided evidence.
evidence: frontend/src/components/WorkCategoryTabs.tsx (no generated icon usage shown; uses Cards/Badges only)

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hooks and actor management (react-query) added despite portfolio being static and auth not required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says third-party auth is not required and to avoid unsupported integrations; adding an authentication system and actor plumbing is not requested for a static portfolio.
evidence: frontend/src/main.tsx (wraps app with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider)

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister stub added (empty Motoko actor).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is frontend-focused and does not request any backend behavior; adding a backend file is extra and not evidenced as needed.
Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements/AC; introduces external referral link in UI.
